mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reviews(reviewno, memberno, reuser, productid, retitle, rating, recontent , reviewdate) VALUES(reviews_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{reuser}, #{productid}, #{retitle} , #{rating}, #{recontent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT reviewno, memberno, productid, reuser, retitle, rating, recontent, reviewdate FROM Reviews WHERE productid = #{productid} ORDER BY reviewno
